cast.name: 弗朗克·迪博斯克 Franck Dubosc
玛蒂尔德·瑟妮 Mathilde Seigner
诺拉·哈姆扎维 Nora Hamzawi
让-弗朗索瓦·凯雷 Jean-François Cayrey
莱瓦娜·所罗门 Lévanah Solomon

director.name: 帕斯卡尔·布迪亚尔 Pascal Bourdiaux

introduction: Bill lives comfortably in his close-knit family, Boule does well at school, his mother provides piano lessons from home and his father is a famous cartoonist. Everything is turned upside down when the harsh and bad-tempered editor of his comic strips, rejects the work of Boule’s father. She perceives a great lack of inspiration in it, due to the fact that his family lives in a world of happiness that has a very negative impact on his creativity. Boule’s father comes back home with the firm intention of shaking his family off happiness by doing a lot of silly things.Boule, Bill and their mother as well begin to partake in the disruption of the family’s happiness, until finally everything explodes.
